companyInfo.Competitors: Allegiance Staffing, Manpower, Volt Information Sciences

jobDescription: Data Scientist  Our client, a global professional services firm, is looking to hire a Data Scientist for their Boston office. This Data Scientist will focus on building and managing tools and procedures related to data and analysis to ensure the company is utilizing the best and most advanced processes. If you are interested in learning more about this opportunity, please submit a copy of your resume today!  ResponsibilitiesCollaborating with various teams to confront data and computing issues/challengesParticipating in research and client events by acting as an expert resourceConsistently discovering and researching new techniques and tools related to data scienceIncreasing the efficiency of procedures and methods to manage and access complex databasesDeveloping interactive data visualizations and portalsQualificationsMaster’s degree in Computer Science, Economics, Statistics or Mathematics; ideally PhDAt least two years’ experience as a Data Scientist in a professional environmentMust have experience with Python, C++, Java, R, Flask, Shiny, SASExperience in database management and visualizationStrong communication skills
